name: Grab Image From Remote URL
author: Mr.Cook

sections.description:
Grab Image From Remote URL plugin simply allows you to download image from Remote URL to save fully compatible WordPress Media Gallery. It also generates thumbnails and supports renaming the filename and title of the grabbed image.

Location of the Plugin:

  • Under the “Media” tab, click “Grab URL”.

List of Features:

  • Direct Image Download from Remote URL
  • (Optional) Filename renaming
  • (Optional) Title renaming

Credits

  • Influenced by Save & Import Image from URL plugin, but more advanced security, filename and title renaming.
sections.installation: For installation, follow the general plugin installation guidelines.

short_description: Allows you to download image from Remote URL to save Wordpress Media Gallery.
